text: fwqahm allah min shdayd dhlk alyawm, waetahm hsnana wnwrana fi wjwhhm, wbhjt wfrhana fi qlwbhm, wa'athabahum bsbrhm fi aldunya ealaa alttaeat janat ezymt yakulun minha ma shawu, wyalbaswn fiha alhryr alnaem, mutakiiyn fiha ealaa alasrrat almzynt bfakhr althyab walstwr, la yarawn fiha hurun shams wala shdt brd, wqrybt minhum ashjar aljanat mzllt elyhm, wsuhhil lahum 'akhdh thmarha tshyla
